param.name: codeOperation
param.doc: transaction key that identifies the operation and who performed it (optional parameter). In case it is not set the system automatically creates one like rest_<random_number>.

method.name: POST
method.id: ARM Generate Request for User Modify API
method.doc: Generates request for user modify in order to modify user attributes
